page.title: 16 PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: {DEATH SQUARE}- (Square pitch,football) Each person kicks the ball once; if it is kicked twice, kicked out of the square, through a player's legs or touches his hands, he is 'set upon' by the other players until he leaves the square. If a player catches the ball, the person who kicked it to him has to run through a tunnel formed by the other players, who kick him. {KERBY}- (2 players,large ball) The ball is bounced against the kerb, rebounds, and is caught for a point. If it rebounds above your head you double your score. {ELASTICS -}(A circle of elastic bands) The elastic is placed around the ankles of two players standing apart. A third player jumps in and out calling "England, Ireland, Scotland, Wales, Inside, Outside" .After ankles the elastic is raised to the knees.
